1.title: A Seance and a Tea Party with a Game of Quarters
1.plot: Four Northeast hoteliers compete for $25,000 by traveling to each other's properties and judging each against the others. The Captain's House Inn, Attwater Hotel, Stowe Meadows Inn, and Firehouse Inn go head-to-head, but which hotelier will sweep the competition?

2.title: What a Drag Clothing Optional
2.plot: Four northeast hoteliers travel to one another's property judging each along the way for a $25,000 prize. They sample restaurants, spas, as well as a surprise clothing optional and funny cross-dressing "Drunkerella" experience.

3.title: Cat's Out of the Bag with a Gun Show
3.plot: Four hoteliers travel nationwide to one another's property judging each along the way for a $25,000 prize. They enjoy poolside cabanas, outdoor hot tubs and one rural-themed hotel showcases newborn kittens for their guests.

4.title: Diamond Diva and the Love Box
4.plot: Four NYC hoteliers travel to each other's properties, judging each along the way for $25,000. One hotelier is a one-woman operation in Brooklyn, and the diamond queen of Long Island City gives her guest rooms a special "love box."

5.title: Bare Feet and Rock Star Sweets
5.plot: Four Midwest hoteliers showcase their properties for $25,000 prize. They live like rock stars & write a song at a retro music motel, live large like locals in Chicago, get lost in an orchard & eat ice cream canapés at a party.

imdb.title: Hotel Showdown
plot: Winner takes all in _Hotel Showdown_ (qv), where four hotels compete to take home $25,000. The four hotel owners will spend the night in each other's hotel and award points for their experience. The hotel with the most points wins.
